trans-unit.source: Implements <xref href="System.Data.IDataRecord"></xref> and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor"></xref>, and provides data binding support for <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbEnumerator"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord"></xref> class.
Indicates the number of fields within the current record.
This property is read-only.
The number of fields within the current record.
Not connected to a data source to read from.
Returns the value of the specified column as a Boolean.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a Boolean.
The column ordinal.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Boolean is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the value of the specified column as a byte.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a byte.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the value of the specified column as a byte array.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a byte array.
The zero-based column ordinal.
The index within the field from which to start the read operation.
The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.
The index for `buffer` to start the read operation.
The number of bytes to read.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the value of the specified column as a character.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a character.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the value of the specified column as a character array.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a character array.
Column ordinal.
Buffer to copy data into.
Maximum length to copy into the buffer.
Point to start from within the buffer.
Point to start from within the source data.
The value of the specified column.
Not currently supported.
Not currently supported.
Not currently supported.
Returns the name of the back-end data type.
The column ordinal.
The name of the back-end data type.
Returns the value of the specified column as a <xref:System.DateTime> object.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a <xref:System.DateTime> object.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> object for the requested column ordinal that can be overridden with a provider-specific implementation.
The zero-based column ordinal.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataReader"></xref> object.
Returns the value of the specified column as a <xref:System.Decimal> object.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a <xref:System.Decimal> object.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the value of the specified column as a double-precision floating-point number.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a double-precision floating-point number.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the <xref:System.Type> that is the data type of the object.
The column ordinal.
The <xref:System.Type> that is the data type of the object.
Returns the value of the specified column as a single-precision floating-point number.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a single-precision floating-point number.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the GUID value of the specified field.
The index of the field to return.
The GUID value of the specified field.
The index passed was outside the range of 0 through <xref:System.Data.IDataRecord.FieldCount*>.
Returns the value of the specified column as a 16-bit signed integer.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a 16-bit signed integer.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the value of the specified column as a 32-bit signed integer.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a 32-bit signed integer.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the value of the specified column as a 64-bit signed integer.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a 64-bit signed integer.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the name of the specified column.
The column ordinal.
The name of the specified column.
Returns the column ordinal, given the name of the column.
The name of the column.
The column ordinal.
Returns the value of the specified column as a string.
No conversions are performed; therefore the data retrieved must already be a string.
The column ordinal.
The value of the specified column.
Returns the value at the specified column in its native format.
The column ordinal.
The value to return.
Populates an array of objects with the column values of the current record.
Using this method may be more efficient for most applications then retrieving each field individually.
An array of <xref:System.Object> to copy the attribute fields into.
The number of instances of <xref:System.Object> in the array.
Used to indicate nonexistent values.

Call this method to check for null column values before calling the typed get methods (for example, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetByte%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader.GetChar%2A>, and so on) to avoid raising an error.
The column ordinal.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified column is equivalent to <xref href="System.DBNull"></xref>; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Indicates the value at the specified column in its native format given the column ordinal.
This property is read-only.
The column ordinal.
The value at the specified column in its native format.
Indicates the value at the specified column in its native format given the column name.
This property is read-only.
The column name.
The value at the specified column in its native format.
Returns a collection of custom attributes for this instance of a component.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetAttributes%2A>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"></xref> that contains the attributes for this object.
Returns the class name of this instance of a component.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetClassName%2A>.
The class name of the object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the class does not have a name.
Returns the name of this instance of a component.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetComponentName%2A>.
The name of the object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the object does not have a name.
Returns a type converter for this instance of a component.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter%2A>.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> that is the converter for this object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> for this object.
Returns the default event for this instance of a component.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetDefaultEvent%2A>.

An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptor"></xref> that represents the default event for this object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this object does not have events.
Returns the default property for this instance of a component.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetDefaultProperty%2A>.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that represents the default property for this object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this object does not have properties.
Returns an editor of the specified type for this instance of a component.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.CustomTypeDescriptor.GetEditor%2A>.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the editor for this object.
An <xref:System.Object> of the specified type that is the editor for this object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the editor cannot be found.
Returns the events for this instance of a component.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetEvents%2A>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the events for this component instance.
Returns the events for this instance of a component using the specified attribute array as a filter.

For more information, see [M:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetEvents.(System.Attribute\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetEvents.(System.Attribute[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True).
An array of type <xref:System.Attribute> that is used as a filter.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the filtered events for this component instance.
Returns the properties for this instance of a component.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the properties for this component instance.
Returns the properties for this instance of a component using the attribute array as a filter.

For more information, see [M:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties.(System.Attribute\[\])](assetId:///M:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetProperties.(System.Attribute[])?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True).
An array of type <xref:System.Attribute> that is used as a filter.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that represents the filtered properties for this component instance.
Returns an object that contains the property described by the specified property descriptor.
For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor.PropertyDescriptor%2A>.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that represents the property whose owner is to be found.
An <xref:System.Object> that represents the owner of the specified property.
